name: Pokewar
body:
### Tired of the same old card games?

Try our take on the classic game war! Experience the drama, action, romance, and explosions!

*Note: Drama, action, romance, explosions may require vivid imagination. Vivid imagination not included in download.
tagline: The card game war, with a pokemon twist.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
